…who had just lost everything  had a warm meal, a roof over their heads, and a shoulder to cry on.

Federal, State, and local governments mobilized to get families the  help they needed, help that has made a tremendous impact on our road to  recovery and rebuilding. Emergency operation hubs were propped up in a  matter of hours. Recovery centers were…
